title: SELECTION OF CABLES FOR MARINE ENVIRONMENT
fullText:
Cables shall conform to AS 60092.350 or AS/NZS 5000.1.
The conductors used in cables shall be annealed copper with cross-sectional area, stranding and conductivity conforming to Class 2 or Class 5 of IEC 60228 or AS/NZS 1125.
The use of solid conductors (single wire) and the use of aluminium conductors is not permitted.
